summary: Add SIGUSR2 signal to the default list of worker shutdown signals. This signal is commonly used by nodemon for graceful shutdown and should be included by default.
userImpact: Developers using nodemon for development will need to manually add SIGUSR2 to shutdown signals instead of having it included by default.
proposedFix: Include SIGUSR2 in the default shutdownSignals list for workers.
resolutionDetails: SIGUSR2 was added to the default worker shutdown signals.
keyQuote: This is the signal nodemon uses for graceful shutdown, it should be in the default list.
